title: march 13: the murder of Breonna Taylor (with Jade Bird)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the murder of Breonna Taylor, a 26-year-old Black medical worker who was shot to death in her own apartment by Louisville, Kentucky police officers. Then, Maia talks about Jade Bird’s hit release. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
